info-we-collect.title: Information We Collect
info-we-collect.text:
We collect the following types of information:

1. EEG Data: We gather EEG data from your NeuroLens device to help analyze your focus levels and improve user experience.

2. Personal Information: This includes your name, email address, and any other data you provide when creating an account or communicating with us.

3. App Usage Data: We collect anonymized statistics about your interactions with the app to identify trends and improve functionality.

how-we-use.title: How We Use Your Information
how-we-use.text:
We use the collected information for the following purposes:

1. EEG Analysis: To provide insights into your focus levels and generate personalized reports.

2. Product Improvement: To refine our algorithms and improve the overall quality of our products and services.

3. Customer Support: To address your inquiries, resolve issues, and ensure a smooth user experience.

4. Communication: To send updates, important notices, and marketing materials if you have opted in.

third-party.title: Third-Party Sharing
third-party.text: We prioritize your privacy and do not share your data with third parties without your explicit consent. Exceptions may include legal requirements, where we are obligated to disclose information to comply with applicable laws or regulations.
